trans-unit.source: Enables you to pass context properties from the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) into the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: Permite passar propriedades de contexto de COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) para o contexto COM+.

trans-unit.source: COMTI provides services for accessing the IBM Customer Information Control System (CICS) and IBM Information Management System (IMS).
trans-unit.target: COMTI fornece serviços para acessar o IBM sistema de controle de informações de cliente (CICS) e o sistema de gerenciamento de informações da IBM (IMS).

trans-unit.source: Essentially, COMTI provides a set of tools and services that ease the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components.
trans-unit.target: Essencialmente, COMTI fornece um conjunto de ferramentas e serviços que facilitam a tarefa de quebra automática de transações do mainframe e lógica de negócios como componentes COM.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o uso de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"> </xref> classe, definindo o <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, enabling the setting of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"> </xref> classe, habilitando a configuração do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>propriedade.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as propriedades de contexto COMTI são passadas para o contexto de COM+; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) context properties are passed into the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as propriedades de contexto COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) são passadas para o contexto COM+.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as propriedades de contexto COMTI são passadas para o contexto de COM+; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
